messages.title: Strong and Stable Leadership in the National Interest
messages.content: We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond, and to lock in the economic progress that the Calder Valley needs. Your vote will help us continue to strengthen Theresa May's and the UK's negotiation position on Brexit. Your vote helps her secure the best deal to strengthen our economy, and helps us get on with the job of making life in the United Kingdom even better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Providing strong and stable leadership for the United Kingdom through Brexit and beyond.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Remember: A vote for Craig Whittaker on Thursday 8th June is the ONLY way to ensure that Theresa May continues to be our Prime Minister

issues.brexitEurope: Your vote will help us continue to strengthen Theresa May's and the UK's negotiation position on Brexit.
issues.economy: Your vote helps her secure the best deal to strengthen our economy.
issues.governance: We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.

leaflet.personalStatement: My record in serving the people of Calder Valley over the last 7 years speaks for itself, but just as importantly, a vote for me ensures that a Conservative MP is elected which will count towards ensuring that Theresa May continues to be our Prime Minister.

examples: My record in serving the people of Calder Valley over the last 7 years speaks for itself.
